name: is-cwebp-readable
description: Check if a Buffer/Uint8Array is available for cwebp image source
author: Shinnosuke Watanabe (https://github.com/shinnn)

scripts.bench: node -p "require('chalk').yellow('NOTE: Smaller is better.\n')" && node benchmark/array-index-of.js && node benchmark/array-includes.js && node benchmark/keys.js && node benchmark/logical-or.js && node benchmark/regexp-test.js && node benchmark/set.js && node -p "''"
